metadata.title: CVE-2018-10472 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in Xen through 4.10.x allowing x86 HVM guest OSusers (in certain configurations) to read arbitrary dom0 files via QMP liveinsertion of a CDROM, in conjunction with specifying the target file as thebacking file of a snapshot.

criterions.comment: xen: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
